articles.content: The matchup at Shrine Auditorium will be staged without spectators due to the COVID-19 pandemic and marks the third time Plant will defend the title he took from Venezuelas Jose Uzcategui in January … [+1829 chars]

articles.title: Melbourne Demons beat Gold Coast Suns despite late AFLW schedule change - ABC News
articles.description: They are no longer co-captains, but Erin Phillips and Chelsea Randall still led from the front in Adelaide's first game of the AFLW season — a 38-point thumping of West Coast.
articles.content:
Adelaide will be desperate to keep Erin Phillips and Chelsea Randall on the park in 2021 after they dominated West Coast in the Crows' 38-point drubbing of West Coast.

articles.title: Barty’s battle: What will 11-month lay-off mean? - The Age
articles.description: It was a post-match comment from rival Simona Halep that highlighted the uncertainty surrounding what Ashleigh Barty’s long gap between tour matches might mean.
articles.content: Barty, 24, is back playing but with ongoing uncertainty over what lies beyond the Australian events in coming weeks. In her close to 12-month absence Naomi Osaka claimed a second US Open (she now has… [+4188 chars]
